Package com.example.flexiMed.service

Class RequestService

java.lang.Object
com.example.flexiMed.service.RequestService
@Service public class RequestService extends Object
Service class for handling ambulance requests. This class provides functionalities such as creating a request, retrieving all requests, retrieving user-specific requests, and managing service history.

      Constructor to initialize dependencies.
      Parameters:
      requestRepository - Repository for accessing request data.
      ambulanceRepository - Repository for accessing ambulance data.
      userRepository - Repository for accessing user data.
      patientRecordsService - Service for managing patient records.
      ambulanceService - Service for managing ambulance operations.
      serviceHistoryService - Service for managing service history logs.
      userService - Service for managing user operations.
      notificationService - Service for sending notifications.

  • Method Details

    • createRequest

      public RequestDTO createRequest(RequestDTO request)
      Creates a new ambulance request.
      Parameters:
      request - The RequestDTO containing request details.
      Returns:
      The created RequestDTO.
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - If the user or an available ambulance is not found.

    • getAllRequests

      public List<RequestDTO> getAllRequests()
      Retrieves all ambulance requests.
      Returns:
      A list of RequestDTOs representing all requests.

    • recordServiceHistory

      public void recordServiceHistory(RequestEntity request)
      Records the service history of a request.
      Parameters:
      request - The RequestEntity to record in the service history.

    • getUserRequests

      public List<RequestDTO> getUserRequests(UUID userId)
      Retrieves all ambulance requests made by a specific user.
      Parameters:
      userId - The unique identifier of the user.
      Returns:
      A list of RequestDTOs representing the user's requests.
      Throws:
      jakarta.persistence.EntityNotFoundException - If no requests are found for the user.

    • getDispatcher

      public UserEntity getDispatcher(String driverContact)
      Retrieves the user entity of the ambulance dispatcher based on the driver's contact.
      Parameters:
      driverContact - The contact information of the driver.
      Returns:
      The UserEntity of the dispatcher.
      Throws:
      jakarta.persistence.EntityNotFoundException - If the dispatcher is not found.
